# FIMSarch

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of FIMS architecture project is to compare statistical computing environments for use in the [FIMS](https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/national/population-assessments/fisheries-integrated-modeling-system) intiative. This is ongoing research. For more details, see the [Working Document](docs/FIMS-architecture-exploratory-analysis.html) or contact th eproject manager, [Dr. Andrea Havron](mailto:andrea.havron@noaa.gov)
